title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Mix eggs and cheese in a bowl.
Combine everything with the pasta and serve hot.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with spices and grill.
Cook tomatoes with cream and spices.
Add chicken to the sauce and simmer.

title: Greek Salad
summary: A refreshing salad with cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese.
instructions: Mix the Lettuce with the tomatoes, yogurt and dressing.
